short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block downloads by file type, file name, or term. Whitelist file, domain, or temporarily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage downloads based on a term in the URL/file, exact file name, or extension. Use a whitelist to manage permitted downloads based on those parameters. Remote access software download will trigger a scam alert warning.
